version_description:
2.3 version of the Force Saber of Light is a completely redesigned app!

- new icon
- saber animations
- device flashlight and vibrations
- customize saber's opening speed and sound
- new backgrounds
- customize user interface
- calibrate sensitivity of your device
Bug fixes and overall performance improvements.

- Force Lightning! Touch the background and feel the force in your finger!
- Overall improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and overall performance improvements.
Bug fixes and overall performance improvements.
Bug fixes and overall performance improvements.
